sentences.sContent: The electronic sensor has been adapted to fit on a newborn baby.
sentences.sCn: 电子传感器已被改装以适应新生儿。

sentences.sContent: Mild jaundice in the newborn is common and often clears without treatment.
sentences.sCn: 新生儿有轻微的黄疸较为常见，通常会不治自愈。

trans.tranOther: A newborn baby or animal is one that has just been born
The newborn are babies or animals who are newborn
